roleset.name: follow the same trajectory, have axes with identical slopes, align with metaphorically

example.name: parallel-v: normally active
example.text: But, analysts say, [Asian cooperation]-1 isn't likely *trace*-1 to parallel the European Common Market approach.

example.name: parallel-v: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: The emerging areas in Asia will still witness the most rapid growth , where the growth rate is expected to parallel that of the last century in mid-1990 's .

example.name: parallel-j
example.text: Now attach two more blue blocks to the top two parallel to the ground.
example.amr: (a / attach-01 :mode imperative :ARG0 (y / you) :ARG1 (b / block :quant 2 :color (b2 / blue) :mod (m / more)) :ARG2 (t / thing :quant 2 :ARG2-of (t2 / top-06 :ARG3 (c2 / cartesian-framework-91 :ARG1 (b3 / build-space)))) :time (n / now) :manner (p / parallel-01 :ARG0 (c / composite-entity :consist-of b) :ARG1 (g / ground)))

roleset.note: PARALLEL NOTES: pragmatic arguments 3,4 added for spatialAMR.
